branchCategory.name: MXJ, High Precision Slide Table
branchCategory.description: <p>The MXJ compact and lightweight precision slide table provides travelling parallelism of 0.005 mm in a compact package.  The actuator guide blocks are made from Martensitic stainless steel for high rigidity and integrated to guide rails for isolating the load bearing from the movement of the piston rod and seals.</p>
